text: annane avane (saheadarane) pparri avar nirasarayi kalinnappeal avar tanicc mariyirunn kutiyaleacana natatti. avaril valiya al parannu: ninnalute pitav allahuvinre peril ninnaleat urapp vanniyittuntennum, yusuphinre karyattil mump ninnal vilcavaruttiyittuntennum ninnalkkarinn kute? atinal enre pitav enikk anuvadam tarikayea, allahu enikk vidhi tarikayea ceyyunnat vare nan i bhupradesam vittupearukaye illa. vidhikarttakkalil erravum uttamanatre avan
